unittitle_ssm: John E. Seley Ground Zero photographs
abstract_ssm: Seventy-nine digital images documenting the destruction of the World Trade Center at Ground Zero in the two months following the terrorist attack of September 11, 2001. The photographer, John E. Seley, is a professor of Urban Planning and Geography at The City University of New York Graduate Center.
corpname_ssm: World Trade Center (New York, N.Y. : 1970-2001) -- Photographs.
collection_ssm: John E. Seley Ground Zero photographs
heading_ssm: John E. Seley Ground Zero photographs
